message.raw:
Add labscript_devices.deprecated_import_alias to declare when a device
class has moved, providing the ability to still import it under the old
name whilst printing a deprecation warning pointing to the new name.
Use this function in DummyPseudoclock/__init__.py.
message.html:

class has moved, providing the ability to still import it under the old
name whilst printing a deprecation warning pointing to the new name.
Use this function in DummyPseudoclock/init.py.
